name: Lichess Comfortable Study Workflow
description: The Buttons below the board, including their corresponding dialogs,  are moved to the top left of the window.
additional_info:
Notice, the style will only take effect when your browser window is wider than 1100 pixels. Otherwise it will fall back to the Lichess default styles.

You can discuss it here:
